sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO bal_usersignadd_info_his (ID_NO, BUSI_TYPE, FIELD_CODE, FIELD_VALUE, OTHER_VALUE, FINISH_FLAG, OP_TIME, LOGIN_NO, LOGIN_ACCEPT, OP_CODE, update_accept, update_type, update_time, update_date, update_login, update_code) select ID_NO, BUSI_TYPE, FIELD_CODE, FIELD_VALUE, OTHER_VALUE, FINISH_FLAG, OP_TIME, LOGIN_NO, LOGIN_ACCEPT, OP_CODE, #UPDATE_ACCEPT#, #UPDATE_TYPE#, sysdate, #UPDATE_DATE#, #UPDATE_LOGIN#, #UPDATE_CODE# from bal_usersignadd_info where id_no = #ID_NO# and busi_type = #BUSI_TYPE# and finish_flag = '0'
